item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 30, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Wasmer 5.0 (119 points | 23 comments)
2. GitHub cuts AI deals with Google, Anthropic (596 points | 391 comments)
3. OpenAI builds first chip with Broadcom and TSMC, scales back foundry ambition (175 points | 97 comments)
4. RIP botsin.space (90 points | 41 comments)
5. Using an 8K TV as a Monitor (284 points | 333 comments)
6. Go library for in-process vector search and embeddings with llama.cpp (32 points | 4 comments)
7. Writing in Pictures: Richard Scarry and the art of children's literature (213 points | 94 comments)
8. Launch HN: Integuru (YC W24) – Reverse-engineer internal APIs using LLMs (158 points | 53 comments)
9. Hobby CAD, CNC machining, and resin casting (28 points | 6 comments)
10. A Performance Comparison of Modern Garbage Collectors (2021) [pdf] (9 points | discuss)
11. Nuclear Fusion's New Idea: An Off-the-Shelf Stellarator (25 points | 5 comments)
12. How to get the whole planet to send abuse complaints to your best friends (356 points | 69 comments)
13. Vector databases are the wrong abstraction (166 points | 31 comments)
14. Digging into PlantStudio, a Bit Late (101 points | 19 comments)
15. Show HN: Kasama – an IntelliJ plugin to keep track of your coding practices (66 points | 22 comments)
16. AgiBot X1, a modular humanoid robot with high dof (27 points | 1 comment)
17. Ancient Monkey: Pwning a 17-Year-Old Version of SpiderMonkey (79 points | 5 comments)
18. The electrostatic world of insects (152 points | 46 comments)
19. When are two proofs essentially the same? (2007) (53 points | 76 comments)
20. Scythe Works Without Borders (49 points | 27 comments)
21. InspectMind AI (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
22. A deep history of Halloween (109 points | 35 comments)
23. Programming a computer for playing chess (1950) [pdf] (89 points | 26 comments)
24. Slot Machines Walk into a Bar: Adventures in Quantity over Quality [video] (30 points | 3 comments)
25. PhD student finds lost city in Mexico jungle (131 points | 78 comments)
26. Five or Ten New Proofs of the Pythagorean Theorem (8 points | 2 comments)
27. Why Slight Failed: A Slight Post-Mortem (130 points | 50 comments)
28. Lies, intrigue, lawsuits: The last battle for a 'cursed' giant emerald (6 points | discuss)
29. A collection of Halloween postcards from "golden age" of picture postcards (7 points | 1 comment)
30. Show HN: Latex.to – LaTeX to image converter running in the browser (67 points | 36 comments)
